flawed_nl_solution:
In the first week, Jed has 20 + 6 = <<20+6=26>>26 cards.
In the second week, he has 26 + 6 = <<26+6=29>>29 cards.
But he is left with 29 - 2 = <<29-2=27>>27 cards on the 2nd week after giving 2 cards to his friend.
Then Jed has 27 + 6 = <<27+6=33>>33 cards on the 3rd week.
He has 33 + 6 = <<33+6=39>>39 cards on the 4th week.
After giving his friend 2 cards, he is then left with 39 - 2 = <<39-2=37>>37 cards on the 4th week.
